summary: A young woman with psychic powers is obsessed with having a child. Even though she is unable to conceive, her desire to do so creates a supernatural force determined to fulfill her wishes.
cast: Bradford Dillman|Marina Malfatti|Gig Young|Delia Boccardo|Micaela Esdra|Lucretia Love|Adriano Amidei Migliano|Luigi Casellato|Vittorio Mangano|Mario Garriba|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Raffaele Di Mario|Matilde Dell'Acqua|Rita Lo Verde|Giuseppe Castelli|Ulla Johannsen|Alba Maiolini|Giuseppe Marrocco
title: El lado oscuro de Deborah
